no_dice: , your roll was rejected because you didn't specify any dice types to roll.
wrong_dice: , your roll was rejected because it didn't contain the correct die sizes. Sentinels uses d4s, d6s. d8s. d10s, and d12s.
help:
To use the Sentinels module please specify one to three die sizes to roll, such as '/sen 8 10 6'. 
 Die sizes of 4, 6, 8, 10, and 12 are accepted. 
 You will get Max, Mid, and Min results.
